H0.text: Cagliari is the capital of which island. Sicilian

H1.text: Cagliari is the capital of which island. Corsican

H2.text: Cagliari is the capital of which island. Italian

H3.text: Cagliari is the capital of which island. Sardic

A4.text: Cagliari is an Italian municipality and the capital and largest city of the island of Sardinia, an autonomous region of Italy.

A5.text: Sardinia is the second largest island in the Mediterranean Sea after Sicily, and one of the twenty regions of Italy.
